markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Deadly Butterfly](/Feats.aspx?ID=2708) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 78</row>

**Archetype** [Butterfly Blade](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=91)

**Prerequisites**
[Butterfly Blade Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2704)

</column>

---

You gain access to the butterfly sword's [critical specialization effect](/Rules.aspx?ID=235). If you already had access to the critical specialization effect or you gain the effect at a later time, you also gain the critical specialization effect for [knives](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=9) when you critically hit with a butterfly sword. You can benefit from only one critical specialization effect at a time.
name: Deadly Butterfly
